translations: 可替换的；可置换的；可放在原处的

sentences.sentence: He would see I was not so easily replaceable.
sentences.translation: 他会看到我不是那么容易被取代的。

sentences.sentence: For many years hip-joints and other body joints have been replaceable either partially or completely.
sentences.translation: 多年来，臀部关节和身体其他关节都是可以部分或完全替换的。
我想要一个可替换的电池。
